channel.title: Exercises on Mike's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Exercises on Mike's Blog

item.title: A tour of Rust, Pt. 2
item.description: In my last post, I talked about what I think is the significance of the programming language Rust, and why I wanted to try learning it. Today, I take a look at Exercism.io (a sort-of social network for programming exercises) and its series of Rust challenges. These are definitely easy problems (so far); the focus is on learning how to solve them in a language that is new to you.
